title: "Out of the shadows: developing capacities and capabilities for tackling undeclared work in Bulgaria, Croatia and FYR Macedonia"
abstractText:
'The main goal is to provide concrete policy recommendations about what policies may work better based on rigorous empirical evidence for those seeking to tackle the undeclared economy in the Balkans. In particular, the objectives of our project are to:
1. Conduct a comprehensive review of the policy approaches and measures being used to tackle undeclared work.
2. Empirically evaluate the measures for facilitating the shift of undeclared work into the declared economy in the selected target region.
3. Based on the results of the first two objectives, the final objective is to recommend possible new policy approaches and measures (or endorse old ones) that will facilitate the shift of undeclared work into the declared economy.'
